abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

error.invalid_known_hosts: Known hosts must be a comma separated list of hosts.

config.description: Known Hosts - A comma-separated list of hostnames or IP-addresses of cast devices, use if mDNS discovery is not working.
config.title: Google Cast configuration

confirm.description: Do you want to start setup?

error.invalid_known_hosts: Known hosts must be a comma separated list of hosts.

advanced_options.description:
Allowed UUIDs - A comma-separated list of UUIDs of Cast devices to add to Home Assistant. Use only if you don’t want to add all available cast devices.
Ignore CEC - A comma-separated list of Chromecasts that should ignore CEC data for determining the active input. This will be passed to pychromecast.IGNORE_CEC.
advanced_options.title: Advanced Google Cast configuration

basic_options.description: Known Hosts - A comma-separated list of hostnames or IP-addresses of cast devices, use if mDNS discovery is not working.
basic_options.title: Google Cast configuration

show_lovelace_view.description: Shows a dashboard view on a Chromecast device.

dashboard_path.description: The URL path of the dashboard to show.
dashboard_path.name: Dashboard path

entity_id.description: Media player entity to show the dashboard view on.
entity_id.name: Entity

view_path.description: The path of the dashboard view to show.
view_path.name: View path

show_lovelace_view.name: Show dashboard view
